audit.title: Factory Audit Coordination
audit.lead: Is your supplier a real manufacturer or a middleman in an apartment? Our audit coordination verifies the legitimacy, capacity, and working conditions of your potential partners before you wire a deposit.

items.title: Production Capacity

qc.title: QC Inspection Scheduling
qc.lead: We schedule inspectors at critical milestones to catch defects early. You receive a detailed PDF report with photos and videos within 24 hours of inspection.

phases.title: Pre-Production Inspection (PPI)
phases.desc: Checks raw materials and components before mass production begins. Crucial for custom products.

phases.title: During Production Inspection (DUPRO)
phases.desc: Occurs when 20-50% of goods are produced. Identifies systemic errors while they can still be fixed.

phases.title: Pre-Shipment Inspection (PSI)
phases.desc: The final check when 80-100% of goods are packed. We verify quantity, workmanship, and packaging integrity.

compliance.title: Compliance Documentation Review
compliance.desc: Shipping non-compliant goods can lead to seizure by US Customs. We review supplier certificates (CE, FCC, FDA, UL) to ensure they are authentic and valid for the US market.

items.title: Photo Evidence
items.desc: High-res photos of product details, packaging, and defects.

items.title: AQL Report
items.desc: Statistical Pass/Fail result based on international standards (AQL 2.5).

items.title: Action Plan
items.desc: Our recommendation on whether to ship, rework, or cancel.

sidebar.title: QC & Audit Services
sidebar.desc: A small upfront cost to prevent thousands in losses from unsellable goods.
sidebar.note: We'll define your inspection criteria during the call.
